mdRecord.dcterms:title: Virginia Highlands Festival of Arts and Crafts
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster for the annual Virginia Highlands Festival of Arts and Crafts July 24- Aug 15 at Abingdon, Virginia. Judged Art, Literary Arts, Recreation, Folk Dancing and Concert, Children's Interpretation, Three Arts Classes, Painting and Sketching, Appalachian Trail Club, Ornithological Club Hikes, Historical Tours, Fashion Show, Flower Show and Lecture, Wild Flower and Bird Slides, Crafts.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Art Festivals
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
